levelDescription: The door closes behind you, leaving you alone in the darkness. Suddenly, everything lights up and you find yourself on the beach. There's a Lighthouse right infront of you up the hill(NORTH), a shipwreck by the coast(EAST) and what looks to be a shed to your left(WEST) by the seaside. Which way do you decide to go?
While making your way up the hill you encouter a gate blocking your path.
You stand outside the lighthouse, do you decide to go?
This is the lighthouse, There's a staircase that leads up to the 2nd floor.
This is the top floor in the lighthouse
You stand outside the shed, do you decide to go in?.
You stand inside the shed. There's a ladder leading down to the basement(NORTH)
You find yourself in the basement of the shed.
You see a shipwreck in the distant, do you decide to explore it?
You find yourself inside the old rustic shipwreck. The captains cabin is to your right(EAST)
You are currently inside the captains cabin.
